name: DICE ADVENTURE
description:
We haven't finished it, but the core mechanik is working.  We keep working on it so subscribe if you are interested! There will be more dice and cards and items. For more information look for a Game Design Document:

https://www.notion.so/dicedungeon/Dice-Adventure-afb83a615e8e4f3da006cd733fa07ae...
